name: Deep Breathing
description: A basic breathing exercise to calm the mind.
posture: Sit comfortably with your back straight.
steps: Inhale slowly through your nose for 4 seconds.
Exhale slowly through your mouth for 4 seconds.

name: Box Breathing
description: A powerful technique to reduce anxiety.
posture: Sit upright or lie down in a comfortable position.
steps: Inhale through your nose for 4 seconds.
Exhale through your mouth for 4 seconds.
Hold the breath out for 4 seconds.

name: 4-7-8 Breathing
posture: Sit or lie down in a relaxed posture.
steps: Inhale through your nose for 4 seconds.
Exhale through your mouth for 8 seconds.

name: Alternate Nostril Breathing
description: Balances energy channels in the body.
posture: Sit in a cross-legged position with a straight back.
steps: Use your right thumb to close your right nostril.
Close the left nostril with your ring finger and exhale through the right.

name: Pursed Lip Breathing
posture: Sit in a relaxed position with a straight back.
steps: Inhale slowly through your nose for 2 seconds.
Purse your lips as if blowing out a candle.
Exhale slowly through your lips for 4 seconds.

name: Diaphragmatic Breathing
description: Strengthens the diaphragm for deeper breathing.
posture: Lie on your back or sit comfortably with one hand on your stomach.
steps: Inhale deeply, letting your belly rise.
Exhale slowly, letting your belly fall.
Focus on belly movement, not chest.

name: Equal Breathing
posture: Sit upright with a relaxed body.

name: Ocean’s Breath (Ujjayi)
description: A soothing breath used in yoga.
posture: Sit with spine erect and mouth closed.
steps: Inhale through your nose with a whisper-like sound.
Keep mouth closed the entire time.
Repeat gently for a few minutes.

name: Stimulating Breath
posture: Sit straight with relaxed shoulders.
steps: Inhale and exhale rapidly through your nose.
Keep mouth closed and breaths short.
Do for 15 seconds, rest, and repeat.

name: Resonant Breathing
posture: Sit or lie comfortably.

name: Body Scan Meditation
posture: Lie down or sit in a relaxed position.

name: Loving-Kindness Meditation
posture: Sit quietly with closed eyes.

name: Mindfulness of Breath
posture: Sit comfortably and stay still.
steps: Bring full attention to the breath.

name: Gratitude Meditation
posture: Sit or lie down in a quiet space.
steps: Close eyes and reflect on what you're grateful for.
Breathe deeply while holding that feeling.

name: Visualization Meditation
posture: Sit with eyes closed and relaxed shoulders.
steps: Visualize a peaceful scene (beach, forest, etc.).
Stay in the scene for a few minutes.

name: Walking Meditation
posture: Walk slowly in a quiet place.
steps: Focus on each step and breath.
Maintain a calm and steady pace.

name: Mantra Meditation
description: Use repeated sounds to calm the mind.
posture: Sit with a tall spine and eyes closed.
steps: Choose a calming word or phrase (like 'Om').
Return to the mantra when distracted.

name: Chakra Meditation
posture: Sit in a quiet space with spine straight.
steps: Focus on each chakra from root to crown.

name: Zen Meditation
posture: Sit cross-legged on the floor or a cushion.

name: Guided Sleep Meditation
description: Wind down before bed for deep sleep.
posture: Lie down in bed or on a mat.
steps: Close your eyes and listen to the voice.
